overview: Laura (Whitney Wright) is an aspiring actress from small town America who made her way to LA with stars in her eyes. Her boyfriend waits patiently for her back home as she struggles with issues of trust and monogamy after hooking up with a handsome (and married) personal trainer. She soon finds herself in a web of affairs, secrets and lies. Is it worse to be cheated on or to be the cheater? Laura finds herself being both in Faithless.
title: Faithless
